entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
